lead_paragraph: Full back Sam Byram has said he was lured to West Ham United after talks with manager Slaven Bilic convinced him that a move to Upton Park would take his game to the next level.

headline.print_headline: Bilic Promise to Develop Game Lured Byram to West Ham
headline.main: Bilic Promise to Develop Game Lured Byram to West Ham

snippet: Full back Sam Byram has said he was lured to West Ham United after talks with manager Slaven Bilic convinced him that a move to Upton Park would take his game to the next level....
